channel.description: Recent content in clean code on Hello Friend

item.title: Clean Code 1: Names
item.description: If we all checked-in our code a little cleaner than when we checked it out, the code simply could not rot. Clean Code 1: Names 1. Choose your name thoughtfully. 2. Communicate your intent. Intervals! (a, b) open [a, b] closed (a, b] open left [a, b) open right 3. Avoid Disinformation. 4. Pronounceable Names. Methods: verb Classes: noun Boolean: isEnough Enum: adjective 5. Avoid Encodings. // Avoid psz int *pszBasket 6.
